text:
he should, therefore, be referred to an FRU 
where emergency obstetric services and facilities for a caesarean section are available. 
Fundal Palpation/Fundal Grip: Helps to 
determine lie and presentation of foetus
Lateral Palpation/Lateral Grip: Helps to locate 
foetal back
First Pelvic Grip/Superficial Pelvic Grip: 
Helps to determine whether head or breech is 
presenting at pelvic brim 
Second Pelvic Grip/Deep Pelvic Grip: Helps 
to know the degree of flexion of head
